column5: Nice, looking forward to the derby!
Kind of surprising that people keep those big old cats.
I want to see some of those hillbilly hand fishers try noodlein' for those cats in Dunnville, in April.

Some nice big cats Steve !!! They sure do fight hard !!!! I get a dozen or so every year in the Ottawa river and sure do bulldog in the current !!!! I see you have no ice down there !!! Up here on sturgeon lake we are still all froze up !!!! Grrr

Good job on the Cats they are my favorite fish to fish for. We have had a hard time netting Bait this spring so we have been using chunks of mackerel for now. Big fish for this year is 48 lbs (blue Cat) we are hoping to put the state record of 72 lbs to bed this year.   Art
My bad. The photos of guys hoisting their fish for a pic indoors are a bit misleading.

Steve,  When is this derby on? Now that we have lost our little newspaper we have no idea what going on at your end of Rainham Rd.  How about I check the  website, duh. And where's my boat keys?  Johnny D
